 insert_drive_file CV

Hello! I am a Ph.D student in CSE at Seoul National University. I am fortunate to be advised by Prof. Gunhee Kim. In 2019, I received Google PhD Fellowship in Natural Language Processing.

My research interest is in the field of Natural Language Generation, especially about (i) understanding data and defining new tasks, (ii) dealing with multi-modalities, and (iii) incorporating reasoning with generation.

I also believe impactful work can come from scalable infrastructure. Therefore, I spend
my spare time to build and maintain our labâ€™s GPU cluster (~200GPUs).

Development Projects

    ðŸ“‹ Collection of evaluation code for natural language generation.

  • zsh-autoswitch-conda
    ðŸ’» ZSH plugin to automatically switch conda environments as you move between directories

  • SNUVL GPU Cluster
    I am one of the main system administrators of SNUVL GPU cluster, which effectively serves ~200 GPUs to ~35 users. We use Ansible, LDAP, Slurm, Prometheus, Grafana, DFS, gpustat-web, and IPMI to build a scalable and stable system.
